documentation.content:
## TheirStack Pricing Structure Overview

```APIDOC
Pricing Model:
  Credit-based system.
  Free Plan:
    - 50 company credits per month.
    - 200 API credits per month.
  Paid Plans:
    - Start at 90€ monthly.
    - Volume discounts available for larger plans.
  Credit Usage:
    - Company Credit: Access to job postings, technologies, and firmographics for a company.
    - API Credit: Used for API requests or webhooks, consumed per record returned.
  Credit Rollover:
    - Unused paid credits roll over and accumulate.
  Credit Reset:
    - Monthly subscriptions receive new credits on the billing date.
    - Yearly subscriptions receive credits annually.
```

## TheirStack API Overview

```APIDOC
API Documentation:
  URL: https://api.theirstack.com
  Description: Access TheirStack's data through flexible, high-performance endpoints for integration into your applications, workflows, or dashboards.
  Features:
    - Job Search
    - Company Search
    - Technographic Data Access
    - Hiring Signals
    - Technographic Signals
    - Painpoint Signals
```

## Data Workflow Overview

```text
When you use our API, App, or Datasets, you're accessing data directly from our database, ensuring you always have the most up-to-date information available. Instead of making live calls to sources for each request, we proactively handle critical steps like data extraction, normalization, company enrichment, and quality assurance. This process guarantees both high-quality data and fast response times.

To guarantee the highest possible quality of data, we follow this process:

Content acquisition
We continuously crawl different data sources, such as job boards, ATSs, and company websites. The frequency of our scrapers varies, with some running as often as every 10 minutes and others hourly, to ensure our data is always up-to-date.

More details:
* [Jobs from 16,000 different websites](/en/docs/data/job/sources)
* [Data freshness and scraping frequency](/en/docs/data/job/freshness)

Extraction & Normalization
For every job we collect, we extract key entities including the job posting, company, and, when available, the hiring manager.

We also identify and extract technologies mentioned in the job title, description, and URL, then index them to enable filtering by tech stack.

To ensure data quality and consistency across the platform, we normalize all extracted fields. For example:

* Job descriptions are converted into standardized Markdown format.
* Locations are structured into city, state, country, and other geographic components.
* Job titles are cleaned to remove special characters and extra whitespace.
* Company industries are harmonized across different data sources.

Additionally, media assets such as company logos are downloaded and stored in our own infrastructure, allowing you to access them reliably via stable URLs for use in your own applications.

Job deduplication
Most companies use an Applicant Tracking System (ATS) to manage their hiring process. ATSs help streamline the candidate lifecycle, power career pages listing open roles, and sync job postings with major job boards like LinkedIn and Indeed.

When a company posts a job through an ATS, it's common for that listing to appear on multiple job boards simultaneously. As a result, a single position may end up with 3–5 different references across various platforms. Additionally, job boards often scrape and repost listings from each other, further increasing duplication.

Job posting deduplication is a crucial step to avoid having the same job posted multiple times in our database. If you use our data as sales signal, you wont' trigger the same signal multiple times. If you use our data to build a job board, you wont' have the same job posted multiple times.

We apply both algorithmic techniques and manual checks to eliminate duplicates effectively.
```

## TheirStack Credits Overview

```APIDOC
Credits:
  Types:
    - Company Credits: Used for revealing company details, accessing jobs, technologies, and firmographics. Access is valid for 90 days after reveal.
    - API Credits: Used for running actions via the TheirStack API.
  Usage:
    - View credit usage by visiting the usage page: https://app.theirstack.com/settings/usage.
  Plan Inclusion:
    - Both credit types are included in free trial and subscription plans. The amount varies based on the TheirStack plan.
```

## Technographics Dataset Overview

```APIDOC
Dataset: Technographics
Description: Offers a complete overview of the technology stacks used by businesses, sourced from job postings.
Record Count: 40 million records
Purpose: Reveals the tools and software companies rely on, helping businesses identify tech trends and target potential customers effectively.
Content Details: Technology stacks, tools, and software used by companies.
```

## Jobs Dataset Overview

```APIDOC
Dataset: Jobs
Description: Provides a complete overview of job postings from over 195 countries since 2021.
Record Count: 50 million records
Purpose: Reveals the tools and software companies rely on, helping businesses identify tech trends and target potential customers effectively.
Content Details: Job postings, company technology usage, tools, and software.
```

## Technographics Dataset Overview

```APIDOC
Dataset: Technographics
Description: Offers a complete overview of the technology stacks used by businesses, sourced from job postings.
Record Count: 40 million records
Purpose: Reveals the tools and software companies rely on, helping businesses identify tech trends and target potential customers effectively.
Content Details: Technology stacks, tools, and software used by companies.
```

## Jobs Dataset Overview

```APIDOC
Dataset: Jobs
Description: Provides a complete overview of job postings from over 195 countries since 2021.
Record Count: 50 million records
Purpose: Reveals the tools and software companies rely on, helping businesses identify tech trends and target potential customers effectively.
Content Details: Job postings, company technology usage, tools, and software.
```

## Technographics API Overview

```APIDOC
Technographics API:
  Description: Reveal the tech stack of 5 million companies across 195 countries.
  Features:
    - Discover the technology stack of companies.
    - Find companies using any of 21,000 technologies.
    - Get notified immediately when new companies start using a technology.
  Call to Action:
    - Try for free: https://app.theirstack.com/signup
    - API Reference: https://api.theirstack.com/#tag/companies/POST/
```
